Package com.metsci.glimpse.event.touch

Glimpse specific listener classes allow Axis1D instances to respond to high level touch events (like pans, zooms, pinches, and swipes).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GlimpseGestureListener  
    GlimpseTouchListener  
    Touchable  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GestureWrapper<I>
    Dispatches touch events and converts them into GlimpseGestureEvents.
    GlimpseGestureAdapter  
    GlimpseGestureEvent
    Gesture implementations vary, but this event implementation should be flexible enough for most platforms.
    GlimpseLongPressGestureEvent  
    GlimpsePanGestureEvent  
    GlimpsePinchGestureEvent  
    GlimpseSwipeGestureEvent  
    GlimpseTapGestureEvent  
    GlimpseTouchEvent  

Package com.metsci.glimpse.event.touch Description

Glimpse specific listener classes allow Axis1D instances to respond to high level touch events (like pans, zooms, pinches, and swipes).
